transcript: Customer: Hello\n\nExecutive: Hello sir good evening main Alok baat kar raha hun India Mart se relationship manager kaise hain sir ji boliye sir main kehta hun aap team ke sath aapka meeting bhi hua tha theek hai aur finally hum logon ne bhi sara kuch discussion kiya hai management se to we have decided ki jo abhi aap demand kar rahe hain ki bhai mere ko star band karna hai aur uske bihaf pe mujhe maximizer service aapko chalu karni hai sir right ji ji to usme sath sath jo aapki expectation hai to unhone ye bhi clear kiya hai sir pehli baat to agar jo aapko aisa lag raha hai ki bhai shayad maximizer mein lead aur improve ho jayegi quality wo ek se do lakh rupaye jo bhi order value ka pehli baat sir main ye abhi hum log convert karne ke liye ready hai usko service ko but waha pe bhi koi aise surety nahi hai ki bhai maximizer mein convert karne ke bawajud bhi wo leads wala jo aapki expectation hai wo meet ho jaye sir ji ji theek hai to next time fir aap us cheez ke liye complaint nahi kar sakte ki bhai sir main ki mere pass abhi ye kyu ek do lakh rupaye ki order wali kyu nahi aa rahi sir kyuki leads ka jo hai uska package se koi matlab nahi hai sir leads in the sense kya hai ki wo aapke product ke name ke according aur jis category ke sath usme mapping ho rahi hai uske according aati hai sir generate hoti hai lead to aayegi na sir ha sir lead to lead to sir sab ke liye available hai na sir ha nahi aisa to lead hi nahi aa rahi to fir kya karenge sir main keh raha hun dekhiye leads ka kya hai ki ye shayad main pehle din se hi hum log expectation clear kar rahe hain jo basic service wala rehta hai mini dynamic category jo hum logon ko sabse starting package hai leads uske pass bhi aati hai main change kya reason kya tha ki us leads ko buy karne ke liye aapke pass points hai available ya nahi hai ji ji dusri cheez kya hai matter karta hai ki aapka preference kya hai ki aaj ki date mein kitni cities se aaj tak aapne buylead buy kiye aapki preferred cities kitna count hai sir uske hisab se bhi suggestions aate hai jiske bihaf pe aapke pass number of inquiries bhi badhti hai aur aapke pass leads ke suggestions bhi kahi na kahi jyada jate hai sir ji ji ji ji theek hai to obviously baat hai ki bhai abhi agar jo kyuki yaha pe aapka consumption jyada tha number of points aapko jyada mil rahe the to us bihaf pe aapki visibility jyada thi waha pe maximizer mein hum logo ko jo isko convert karenge to kahi na kahi uska impact karega sir aapko is cheez ke liye main pehle to badha degi increase to badha denge ha main do cheez main isliye keh raha hun ki kyuki ye aapka khud ka personal decision hai isme India Mart ka kahi se koi role nahi hai ki bhai kal ki date mein fir aap us cheez ke liye complaint nahi kariye kyuki abhi regular basis pe jitni aapki complaint aa rahi hai uske bihaf pe management ne mujhe abhi isliye bola hai ki bhai aap client ki expectation clear kar dijiye ki kal ki date mein fir us cheez ke liye bar bar complaint mat karna ki bhai mujhe lead nahi mili hai is tarike se ho raha hai sir nahi to lead to doge na sir aap lead to doge na kisi product ki doge jaise 10 product dete hai usme do ki to doge na sir main keh raha hun lead ke suggestions jate hain jo normal suggestion rehte hain wo jayenge sir ji main main is cheez ki surety nahi hai ki wo kitni lead rahegi kitni quantity ki rahegi us cheez ke liye koi quantity ka koi issue nahi hai wo to 2000 ki lead aao bhale 2000 ki aao koi nahi lekin lead aani chahiye bas wo hai sir leads ka to leads ka to aapke pass kabhi bhi package jo India Mart chala raha hai sir obviously baat hai us category se related koi leads available hogi to wo dikhegi dikhegi sir aisa to nahi hai aisa to niche aa rahi nahi lead wo puri de rahi hai lead to wo wo aisa to hona chahiye to wo to complaint to aani padegi sir koi bhi aisa perception mat banaiye sir main isliye main keh raha hun aap purane client hai India Mart mein koi bhi particular person jo hai na koi customization nahi karta hai sir yaha pe sara ka sara automatic process hai jis product mein aapki mapping ho rakhi hai jo sari cheeze usme automatically generate hota hai sir automatically hota hai na to sir jo leade aa rahi thi wahi aap se baat karne ke baad mein wahi leade aani band ho gayi portal show nahi kar raha hai sir main keh raha hun ki do leade uthai hai uthai hai to uthai hai jo cheez aapko show karegi wo to ek karegi ab aap mera ye dekhiye portal do hafte mein maine kitni lead buy ki hai lead nahi jayegi to jahir si baat hai main to shikayat karunga sir to main main tabhi to keh raha hun to fir wo solution fir kahan pe hoga sir fir us cheez ka solution kehne ka matlab sold out ka lead ka sold out lead ka koi aisa koi solution nahi hai wo sold out nahi bol raha hun main sold out ka nahi bol raha hun kehne ka matlab jo lead aa rahi hai chalo man liya 100 lead aayi usme 20 lead sold out ho gayi ab 100 ki 100 hi sold out ho jayegi agar banda baitha hai aur jaise main abhi bhi baitha hun jaise log shukrwar hai office band kar dete hai fir bhi hum log baithe hai side pe hi aur laptop chalu hai ab portal to show nahi karegi to wo banda kaise kam karega ye bhi aap bataiye sir sir main keh raha hun ki dekhiye aisa koi aisa nahi hai ki portal portal pe na show kare sir ha to portal to show karega to koi issue nahi hai portal to show karna chahiye wahi to keh raha hun sir wahi cheez main aapko batana chah raha tha ki jo star ke pass bhi aapka ye expectation aaya hai na ki wo cheez jo aaj aaj aapko wo bhale hi decision ho even koi bhi us cheez ke liye agree nahi kar raha hai mere management mein koi ek single person bhi us cheez ke liye agree nahi kar raha hai ki sir ko shayad lag raha hai ki aise main kam kar lunga to wo ek tarike se aap apna business hi kam karne ja rahe hain sir aap investment kam nahi karne ja rahe wo aap apna business bhi kam karne ja rahe hain sir wo dono cheeze similar hai sir theek hai kyuki jo jo aaj ki date mein aapke product ka competition hai agar jo aap ye keh rahe hain ki bhai main itni lead milne ke bawajud bhi main usme business nahi nikal pa raha hun aur aaj ki date mein hum log ek step aur niche ja rahe hain aur waha pe soch rahe hain ki bhai main shayad mera investment kam hoga aur mera business aur jyada badh jayega sir to wo cheez main abhi aapko isliye clear karna chah raha hun sir investment to main aur bhi kar sakta hun wo wali baat nahi hai kehne ka matlab main ek step niche kyu utar raha hun ki mere ko pata hai nuksan ja raha hai nuksan jayega to meri mere ko pata hai abhi chota nuksan hai fir bada nuksan hoga to bharpai India Mart bhi nahi karega sir main tabhi to keh raha hun ki wo cheez ke liye patience aapko rakhna padega na sir wo aapko patience to main rakh raha hun na sir abhi maine ye to nahi bola 15 din nahi bola hai sir patience rakhne na aapke din raat subah sham aapke tickets aa rahe hain sir aapko lagta hai ki bhai ticket to sir wo aap nahi sir wo to ticket to dene hi padta hai na sir jab bande koi kam nahi karte hain to ticket to dene hi padta hai sir kaun kam nahi kar raha hai sir ye statement aap kehne ka matlab aap nahi kar rahe hain hone ke baad mein na real batao karte to aapke main bata to raha hun na sir kam nahi karte to fir lead inquiry thodi na generate hoti sir suniye suniye sir bura mat manna aap jab maine main se baat karne ke baad mein na ye position ho gayi ki main panch lead bhi buy nahi kar pa raha hun aur aap mera portal bhi utha ke dekh lijiye sir main keh raha hun ki complaint dal di hai sir market jo hai dekhiye hum log India Mart jo deta hai sir wo market mein jo inquiry generate ho rahi hai wo hum log aap tak pahuncha pa rahe hain sir nahi wo to pahuncha pa rahe hain lekin mahine ek jaisa nahi chalta sir wo mere ko bhi pata hai ek time jyada bhi aata hai ek time hota hai ki bhai kam bhi hota hai wo hume kam bhi accept karna padega wo to mere ko bhi pata hota hai sir tyoharon ke season mein thoda jyada badh jata hai aur jaise shadiyon ka mausam chalta hai to kam follow rahega wo to mere ko bhi pata hai main bhi business mein hi hun kyuki abhi kaun kam karwayega mere ko pata hai shadiya chal rahi hai wo chal rahi hai to wo hai koi nahi aap maximizer kar dijiye koi nahi theek theek theek hai sir aur aap mere ko ji ji main isko main isko process kara deta hun sir theek hai iska sense kya rahega ki isko service ko agar jo hum log download karenge to fir wo tickets wagera jo hai wo aapko band karna padega uski isliye main aapse final confirmation le raha hun recording ki main abhi aapka jo hai suniye meri baat par wo change kijiye aap aur jo bhi discount wagera aap de rahe ho wo mere ko bataiye kya hai kya nahi hai maximizer ka aur jo bhi hai sir dekhiye mere ko kisi ki badnami karke mere ko khud ko bhi achcha nahi lagta hai kyuki feeling sab mein hoti hai sir ji samajh rahe ho na aap India level pe kam kar rahe ho aap bhi badi company ho ab jaise India level pe aap company kam kar rahi hai usme agar feedback nikal ke nahi aayega kuch cheez genuine nahi aayega to kaise chalega kam wo to aap bhi samajhte ho main bhi samajhta hun koi bhi banda ho bilkul sir to sir dekhiye abhi aap agar jo bol rahe hain na proposal ka pehli baat kya hai ki jo abhi aapki service chal rahi hai star ki star ki service pehle download hogi download in the sense kya hai ki dono ke dono jo aapki categories chal rahi hai wo download hogi sir download hone ke baad jaise band hogi uske baad finance ki team batayegi ki iska kitna paisa adjust kar sakte hain hum log nayi service mein sir ji to abhi aap jo aaj aap mere se puchenge ki bhai aap mujhe performa bana ke bhej do kitna mera amount dikh raha hai to wo abhi main amount uska to bhej dijiye aap ki bhai iska itna itna maximizer ka kya kya charge hai maximizer ke jo jo fayde hain jo jo cheeze hain wo main aapko mail kar deta hun uske bihaf pe kyuki main jo final amount aap bolenge ki bhai kitna adjustment hoga kya hoga wo amount mein to kaun badhne wala hai wo to jitna din chala hai wo to katega hi katega bas bas bas usi hisab se main isliye main aapko keh raha hun aur jis din aapki service download hogi tab tak ka time period aapka count hoke uske hisab se aapka calculation wo to koi issue nahi hai aap maximizer mere ko bhej dijiye bhai itne saal ye package hai itne saal ka ye theek theek hai sir wo detail main bhej deta hun ok ok ok ok ok thank you sir thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads stopped after talking to the executive.

- Portal is not showing leads.

- Wants discount details for Maximizer.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Executive assured to send Maximizer details via mail.

- Executive will process the Maximizer request.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send Maximizer details via mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

- Angry -> Satisfied
